ygData.subject: Rescue Mission
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Thank you, Zardus. ... Hot Rod took cover, behind a rock. ... K9 arrived, and took cover. ... Hot Rod kept moveing around, trying to get a better view.

OOC: Thank you, Zardus.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod took cover, behind a rock.

::K9::

K9 arrived, and took cover.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod kept moveing around, trying to get a better view.

::K9::

K9 was starteled by the movement, behind a rock, and opened fire.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod was hit, by K9's shot, and went into stasis. He was not
transformed, so enternal repairs could not activate.

::K9::

"Nooooooo! Oh, $#!%!"

OOC: Logo, Hot Rod has been injured, so he can be reprogramed, by
Feline. I like the idea. And haveing Hot Rod, and ex-Autobot commander
evil, will be something new.
